docs.title: 🌍 Welcome to the GEOLocation-Mapper Project!
docs.text:
Importaint

This project is very early stage and the code is not ment for Production usage. Use with Caution and report Problems via Github issue

docs.title: ⚠️ Disclaimer
docs.text: This tool is designed for educational and research purposes only. The creator assumes no responsibility for any illegal or unethical activities. Users must comply with all relevant laws and regulations in their jurisdiction.

docs.title: 📌 About the Project
docs.text:
The GEOLocation-Mapper project is a real-time GPS heat map visualization tool that highlights areas of high activity. Inspired by Snap Map, this tool provides dynamic insights into movement patterns, allowing users to explore activity changes over time.

Unlike static heat maps, this project integrates a time-based dimension, enabling users to analyze how movement trends evolve throughout the day. All data is displayed on an interactive OpenStreetMap, ensuring a seamless and intuitive experience.

docs.title: 🔥 Core Features
docs.text: ✅ Dynamic Heat Map – Real-time visualization of GPS data clusters. ✅ Time-Based Analysis – Explore movement trends across different timeframes. ✅ Interactive OpenStreetMap – Navigate and analyze data effortlessly.

docs.title: 🚀 Current Goals
docs.text:
• Import GPS data into a structured database.
  • Create an interactive map preview with basic visualization.

docs.title: 💡 Future Possibilities
docs.text: 🔹 Advanced Filtering – Customize views based on location, time, and activity levels. 🔹 User Interaction – Enable data contributions and interactive map elements. 🔹 Real-Time Updates – Implement live tracking for dynamic visualization.

docs.title: 📢 Stay Tuned!
docs.text:
This project is still in its early stages, but the vision is clear: making spatial movement data intuitive and insightful!

🚧 Development is ongoing, and exciting updates are coming soon! 🚀
